enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: While the corridors remained calm on day one, old controversies were revisited in the Plenary halls.

Discussions on non-Annex I communications in the SBI evoked a feeling of déjà vu for at least one delegate, and concerns were expressed that SBSTA negotiations might get bogged down by the same old issue of forestry and land use.
At the same time, observers expressed uncertainty at the potential shape or form of the brewing discussions on the financial mechanism.
